Different genotypes of mice may respond differently to LPS and require different serum dilutions to accurately measure cytokine production. Additionally, serum concentrations of individual cytokines vary. Adjust serum dilutions as needed between genotypes and cytokines to keep samples within the range of the standard curve.
We recommend use of an automated plate washer for consistency, but plates can also be washed manually using a wash bottle.
